# this is the build file for project DuoBoloNetwork
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(DuoBoloNetwork LANGUAGES CXX)

# target
add_executable(UQAC_ReseauTP3 "")
set_target_properties(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "UQAC_ReseauTP3")
set_target_properties(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/windows/x64/release")
target_include_directories(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE
    include
)

target_compile_definitions(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE
    NOMINMAX
    WIN32_LEAN_AND_MEAN
    NOGDI
    NOUSER
)
target_compile_options(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:/wd4251>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/wd4251>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:/utf-8>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CUDA>:-DNDEBUG>
)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE /utf-8)
elseif(Clang)
    target_compile_options(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE -finput-charset=UTF-8)
    target_compile_options(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE -fexec-charset=UTF-8)
elseif(Gcc)
    target_compile_options(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE -finput-charset=UTF-8)
    target_compile_options(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE -fexec-charset=UTF-8)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE /EHsc)
elseif(Clang)
    target_compile_options(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE -fexceptions)
    target_compile_options(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE -fcxx-exceptions)
elseif(Gcc)
    target_compile_options(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE -fexceptions)
endif()
set_target_properties(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE cxx_std_20)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-O2>)
else()
    target_compile_options(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET UQAC_ReseauTP3 PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(UQAC_ReseauTP3 PRIVATE
    imgui
    Bullet2FileLoader
    Bullet3Collision
    Bullet3Common
    Bullet3Dynamics
    Bullet3Geometry
    Bullet3OpenCL_clew
    BulletDynamics
    BulletCollision

    BulletSoftBody
    LinearMath
    raylib
    opengl32
    enet6
    imm32
    gdi32
    user32
    winmm
    shell32
    ws2_32
)
